title: Olympic Heartbreak for Brandon McNulty In Time Trial: ‘In My Heart I Wanted A Medal’
content:
5th is decade best by US male, while Magnus Sheffield sees medal chances deflate in spill on wet roads: 'It was like I was on ice.'

Read the full article at Olympic Heartbreak for Brandon McNulty In Time Trial: ‘In My Heart I Wanted A Medal’ on Velo.
author: ahood
